section.title: AI Capabilities for Every Home Service
section.description: Specialized AI features designed for cleaning, gardening, repairs, and maintenance businesses in the UAE

capabilities.title: Smart Cleaning Service Booking
capabilities.description: AI understands cleaning needs - weekly housekeeping, deep cleaning, or post-construction cleanup with specific requirements

capabilities.title: Garden & Landscaping Intelligence
capabilities.description: Seasonal awareness for garden maintenance, lawn care scheduling, and plant-specific services across UAE climate zones

capabilities.title: Appliance Repair Diagnostics
capabilities.description: AI guides customers through appliance troubleshooting and matches them with specialized repair technicians

capabilities.title: Painting Project Calculator
capabilities.description: Instant paint quantity calculations, color matching advice, and project timeline estimation for any painting job

capabilities.title: Multi-Service Coordination
capabilities.description: Manage complex home projects requiring multiple services - cleaning after painting, garden design after construction

capabilities.title: Service Package Intelligence
capabilities.description: AI explains different service packages clearly and recommends the best fit based on customer needs and budget
